The Work to Be Done.--Inaction and delicate idleness is weakening the life forces of young women. There are those who spend hours of precious time in 
                                                                           147
bed, which is not blessing them with increase of strength or relieving others from burdens, but is bringing upon them debility and confirming them in wrong habits. These hours idled away needlessly in bed can never be regained. The sin of time thus lost is marked in the book of records.
